title: Remainder Theorem Definition
text: The remainder theorem is as follows: if f(x) is being divided by (x-a), then the remainder is equal to f(a). This means that we must plug in $$x=-2$$ into our dividend.

title: Plugging In
text: $$4x^3+5x^2-2x+7$$ becomes 4(-2)**3+5(-2)**2-2(-2)+7. This means our remainder is -1
